resources.string: Abhinav can control the cycle of day and night with his jetpack. He uses this ability to maintain balance and protect the city from threats that emerge in the dark.
Master of many tricks and is an assassin
Shivam has the ability to see through illusions and lies, ensuring that justice is always served with absolute clarity.
Tushar uses his powers to blend into any environment, making him a master of stealth and infiltration. His agility and strength make him a formidable opponent.
has an innocent outlook towards the world
Harsh draws his strength from the spirit of the canary, allowing him to soar through the skies and face dangers with unwavering courage.
